data.lyric:
[ti:Slow Down Summer]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Slow Down Summer]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.30]Slow Down Summer - Thomas Rhett
[00:00.88]Lyrics by：Jesse Frasure/Thomas Rhett/Rhett Akins/Sean Douglas/Ashley Gorley
[00:02.39]Composed by：Jesse Frasure/Thomas Rhett/Rhett Akins/Sean Douglas/Ashley Gorley
[00:04.49]
[00:15.67]Your shades on my dashboard shoes on my floorboard
[00:18.69]Lived in that old Chevrolet
[00:20.67]
[00:21.57]We were two Roman candles too hot to handle
[00:24.63]Two hearts that couldn't be tamed
[00:26.68]
[00:27.51]Yeah we knew what was comin'
[00:30.04]And laughed it off like it was nothin'
[00:32.86]
[00:33.40]Oh but time kept on runnin' and runnin' away
[00:37.45]
[00:38.39]Yeah what can I say
[00:39.49]We had our hopes up and the windows down
[00:42.84]
[00:43.52]Fallin' fast in a one-lane town
[00:46.65]Tangled up with your lips on mine
[00:49.69]Never seen a brighter green in those eyes and
[00:52.67]I put my jacket on your shoulder
[00:54.84]
[00:55.69]Wishin' the weather wasn't gettin' colder
[00:58.67]Lettin' you go holdin' onto each other
[01:01.49]Closin' our eyes sayin' "Slow down summer"
[01:06.33]Slow down summer
[01:08.44]
[01:10.46]I was beggin' those leaves "Don't go changin' on me"
[01:13.89]"Friday night lights stay away"
[01:15.92]
[01:16.68]But the Fourth of July was just smoke in the sky
[01:19.94]And our sunburns were startin' to fade
[01:22.07]
[01:22.81]Yeah we knew what was comin'
[01:25.36]And laughed it off like it was nothin'
[01:28.10]
[01:28.70]Oh but time kept on runnin' and runnin' away
[01:32.93]
[01:33.95]Yeah those were the days
[01:34.85]We had our hopes up and the windows down
[01:38.92]Fallin' fast in a one-lane town
[01:41.46]
[01:41.99]Tangled up with your lips on mine
[01:45.08]Never seen a brighter green in those eyes and
[01:48.21]I put my jacket on your shoulder
[01:50.34]
[01:51.05]Wishin' the weather wasn't gettin' colder
[01:53.82]Lettin' you go holdin' onto each other
[01:57.03]Closin' our eyes sayin' "Slow down summer"
[02:01.75]Slow down summer
[02:03.99]
[02:05.46]Why couldn't you slow down summer
[02:08.79]Just wait a minute we weren't finished
[02:11.50]Can we just hold onto each other
[02:14.93]Take me back to the beginnin' oh
[02:20.13]
[02:20.94]Slow down summer
[02:22.36]
[02:26.98]Slow down summer
[02:29.05]Yeah those were the days
[02:30.15]We had our hopes up and the windows down
[02:34.31]Fallin' fast in a one-lane town
[02:37.36]Tangled up with your lips on mine
[02:39.86]
[02:40.42]Never seen a brighter green in those eyes and
[02:43.45]I put my jacket on your shoulder
[02:45.55]
[02:46.56]Wishin' the weather wasn't gettin' colder
[02:49.49]Lettin' you go holdin' onto each other
[02:52.32]Closin' our eyes sayin' "Slow down summer"
[02:57.19]Slow down summer
[02:58.88]
[03:00.99]Slow down summer yeah
[03:06.00]
[03:06.86]Why couldn't you slow down summer
[03:12.43]
[03:13.01]Why couldn't you slow down
[03:18.72]
[03:20.19]Slow down
[03:24.44]
[03:25.47]Why couldn't you slow down summer
data.trans:
[ti:Slow Down Summer]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Slow Down Summer]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.30]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.88]//
[00:02.39]//
[00:04.49]
[00:15.67]你的墨镜放在我车子的仪表盘上 鞋子散落在地上
[00:18.69]住在那辆破旧的雪佛兰车里
[00:20.67]
[00:21.57]我们就像是滚烫的烟火筒 让人难以触碰
[00:24.63]我们的心桀骜不驯
[00:26.68]
[00:27.51]我们知道接下来会发生什么
[00:30.04]但我们一笑置之 装作什么都没发生的样子
[00:32.86]
[00:33.40]但时间匆匆流逝
[00:37.45]
[00:38.39]我还能说什么呢
[00:39.49]我们满怀希望 摇下车窗
[00:42.84]
[00:43.52]在这个只有单行道的城镇里迅速沉沦
[00:46.65]我们肆意拥吻 缠绵悱恻
[00:49.69]我从未见过更加明亮的绿色眼眸
[00:52.67]我将夹克披在你的肩上
[00:54.84]
[00:55.69]希望天气不要愈发寒冷
[00:58.67]放开你的手 彼此紧紧相拥
[01:01.49]我们闭上眼睛说着 盛夏时节 请放慢脚步
[01:06.33]盛夏时节 请放慢脚步
[01:08.44]
[01:10.46]我恳求那些树叶不要在我面前凋零
[01:13.89]周五夜晚灯火辉煌 走出家门尽情狂欢
[01:15.92]
[01:16.68]但七月四日这天 天空烟雾弥漫
[01:19.94]我们身上的晒痕渐渐消褪
[01:22.07]
[01:22.81]我们知道未来会发生什么
[01:25.36]但我们一笑置之 装作什么都没发生的样子
[01:28.10]
[01:28.70]但时间匆匆流逝
[01:32.93]
[01:33.95]那段美好的日子
[01:34.85]我们满怀希望 摇下车窗
[01:38.92]在这个只有单行道的城镇里迅速沉沦
[01:41.46]
[01:41.99]我们肆意拥吻 缠绵悱恻
[01:45.08]我从未见过更加明亮的绿色眼眸
[01:48.21]我将夹克披在你的肩上
[01:50.34]
[01:51.05]希望天气不要愈发寒冷
[01:53.82]放开你的手 彼此紧紧相拥
[01:57.03]我们闭上眼睛说着 盛夏时节 请放慢脚步
[02:01.75]盛夏时节 请放慢脚步
[02:03.99]
[02:05.46]盛夏时节 你为什么不能放慢脚步呢
[02:08.79]稍等片刻 我们意犹未尽
[02:11.50]我们能否紧紧拥抱着彼此
[02:14.93]让我回到起点
[02:20.13]
[02:20.94]盛夏时节 请放慢脚步
[02:22.36]
[02:26.98]盛夏时节 请放慢脚步
[02:29.05]那段美好的日子

[02:46.56]希望天气不要愈发寒冷

[02:52.32]我们闭上眼睛说着盛夏时节 请放慢脚步

[03:00.99]盛夏时节 请放慢脚步
